entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
